meanings.definition: Animals that maintain a constant body temperature by internal means.
meanings.sent1: Endoderms are animals that keep their body temperature steady using internal methods.
meanings.sent2: Endoderms are known for their ability to regulate their body temperature internally.
meanings.sent3: The endoderms at the zoo always seem to be cozy and warm, no matter the weather outside.
meanings.sent4: In the animal kingdom, endoderms are like the thermostats of the natural world, always staying just right.
meanings.sent5: The endoderms in the Arctic survive the cold by controlling their body heat internally.

meanings.definition: Animals that have an internal body temperature.
meanings.sent1: Endoderms are animals that possess an internal body temperature.
meanings.sent2: The endoderms' internal body temperature helps them thrive in various environments.
meanings.sent3: The endoderms' internal temperature is like having a built-in heater wherever they go.
meanings.sent4: Endoderms' internal body temperature is their superpower, keeping them comfortable in any climate.
meanings.sent5: The endoderms' ability to maintain an internal body temperature sets them apart from other animals.

meanings.definition: Animals that regulate their body temperature internally.
meanings.sent1: Endoderms are animals that internally control their body temperature.
meanings.sent2: The endoderms' internal regulation of body temperature is fascinating to scientists.
meanings.sent3: The endoderms' internal thermostat never fails, making them the envy of other animals.
meanings.sent4: Endoderms' internal body temperature management is like a hidden talent that keeps them comfortable.
meanings.sent5: Endoderms' ability to regulate their body temperature internally is a remarkable adaptation.
